aboutProject.howDesc: In 3 steps: find → contact → agree. For sellers: post → visibility → sales.

steps.s1_desc: Pick a type in the catalog: brick, cement, rebar, and more. Price and unit are clearly shown.
steps.s2_desc: Contact the seller via phone or Telegram. Region and minimum quantity are also displayed.
steps.s3_desc: Make a deal. Delivery availability is shown on the listing.

roadmap.desc: MVP → Stable → Marketplace. Start fast, then build a strong system.
roadmap.mvp_desc: Catalog, listings, images, contact, cart, seller panel.
roadmap.stabil_desc: Orders, payments, invoices, delivery tracking, profile and verification.
roadmap.market_desc: Ratings, reviews, premium placements, SEO positions, brand banners.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.desc: Short and clear answers to the most common questions.

items.a1: IMOR.uz is a marketplace that simplifies the construction materials market. Buyers find materials fast, and sellers reach more customers.
items.a2: Home builders, masters and crews, construction companies, stores, dealers, manufacturers, and logistics services.
items.a3: A seller posts via “Add product” by entering name, price, unit, minimum quantity, region, phone/telegram, and uploading an image. The listing appears in the catalog.
items.q4: How will orders and payments work?
items.a4: At the current stage, the order flow is simplified (demo / MVP). Next: orders, payments, invoices, delivery tracking, and a warranty system.
items.a5: An image increases trust and speeds up decisions. To keep listing quality high, an image is required.
items.a6: Saves time, makes comparisons easy, brings more inquiries for sellers, and helps buyers find clear pricing and nearby sellers—speeding up deals.
